column1: The year 1999 in film included Stanley Kubrick's final film Eyes Wide Shut
column2: Pedro Almodóvar's first Oscar-winning film All About My Mother
column7: Longer & Uncut and My Neighbors the Yamadas
column10: the Pixar sequel film Toy Story 2
column11: and the Deep Canvas-pioneering Disney animated feature Tarzan. Other noteworthy releases included Spike Jonze and Charlie Kaufman's breakout film Being John Malkovich and M. Night Shyamalan's breakout film The Sixth Sense
column12: the controversial Fight Club and Paul Thomas Anderson's Magnolia. The year also featured George Lucas' top-grossing Star Wars: Episode I – The Phantom Menace. Columbia Pictures and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer celebrated their 75th anniversaries in 1999.
